entries.title_d: Destroy the pirate ambush. Your patrol route has been successful and, as planned, the Commerce Raiders have attacked you. You must destroy the pirates that have attacked you. Once you have completed this task return to the Tatooine space station, target it by pressing the 'C' key, and use the /comm command and return to your commanding officer.
entries.title: Tatooine System: Destroy the Commerce Raiders
entries.split_quest_alert_fail: This isn't the first time that new pilots have failed their first time out. We expect you to try again until you can get it right. Sending you a new navigation location to another patrol route.
entries.split_quest_alert: Commerce Raiders are on an intercept course. Destroy them!
entries.complete: Mission Complete!  Return to your superior for the next assignment by travelling to the Tatooine Space Station, target it by pressing the 'C' key, and using /comm.
